Tanks

类 Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a projectile fired by a tank.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      boolean exploded 
      int explodeStartTime 
      float explodeX 
      float explodeY 
      float explosionRadius 
      static float GRAVITY

      Constructs a new Projectile object.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Draws the projectile on the screen.
      void explode(float x, float y)
      Explodes the projectile at the specified position.

      Updates the position and state of the projectile.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(float x,
                  float y,
                  float angle,
                  float power,
                  int r,
                  int g,
                  int b,
                  java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a new Projectile object.
        参数:
        x - the x-coordinate of the projectile's initial position
        y - the y-coordinate of the projectile's initial position
        angle - the angle at which the projectile is fired
        power - the power of the projectile
        r - the red component of the projectile's color
        g - the green component of the projectile's color
        b - the blue component of the projectile's color
        name - the name of the player who fired the projectile

    • 方法详细资料

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the position and state of the projectile.

      • explode

        public void explode(float x,
                    float y)
        Explodes the projectile at the specified position.
        参数:
        x - the x-coordinate of the explosion position
        y - the y-coordinate of the explosion position

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draws the projectile on the screen.
        参数:
        app - the App object representing the game
